title: An author of a piece of content.
description: Models attribution to an individual or group for contribution towards some content item.

type.description: Indicates that this is an author

org.description: The (optional) organization the contributor belongs to.

description.description: A description/short bio of the contributor.

url.description: A url to some deeper set of information about the contributor.

social_links.description: A list of social links (twitter, facebook, etc) for this contributor.
